lines.text:
[appearing as a hologram]
So good evening, teacher!

[gasps]
What's that?
Hey, look there.
[Tracy looks and Michael applies a pressure point, causing Tracy to faint]
I don't want trouble commander. But if you threaten my friends... I'll interfere.

I think you're confusing the facts, teacher! You were created to kill... you were not created to serve and protect. These humans may find your powers impressive, but against the 701 Squad you are not invincible. The 701 Squad now answers to no-one, and together we can have the absolute power!
I think when you lost all your feelings commander, you lost something else along the way. I think you lost your mind.
Listen to me! I'll let you come back with us immediately. No other chance!
I belong here! Not with you!
So you want to feel again? Very sweet. Goodbye then, teacher... that's all. Sorry to hurt your feelings.

[after finding out something went wrong with his friend, Rock]
Something's wrong! I'll go to save him.
Are we going down the gutter?
You can't go. It's too dangerous.
Why?
I can't let you take any more risks. If I don't come back in a half-hour, you should leave here at once.
Wait. Let me look at your face.
Why?
Because you promised me that.
You promise you'll keep this a secret?
Promise. I won't even tell Tsui Chik, that nerd!
[Tsui removes his mask, and it shocks Tracy. After showing some laughter, she hugs Tsui]
I'm leaving.

[shouts after Tsui]
I'll wait for you for dinner!
I knew you'd find me if I let myself be caught. I'm so glad you've come back to join us.

[smiles]
Come back? No Cailyn.
It's your fate. No matter what, you're still one of us.

[watching the children play at the park]
If I told you there was a place for us outside of death, without all the killing... that you and I could leave it all behind, just by walking away... would you do it?

[skeptically]
Look Michael, let's not pretend we're like these people. We're killers.
But not machines. Even a killer can choose not to kill.
I like it here, it's quiet. Nobody ever bothers a librarian.

[Jimmy Jimmy is finishing urinating]
Ahhhh! It's the cops just when you need a hand. I'm Jimmy Jimmy. Follow me. This way, King Kau's expecting you.
[he walks through the King Kau gang which makes way for him - the gang refuses to move for Rock so he pushes a gang member out of the way]
Get lost... thank you.

[Runs past Cailyn who is tied up and hanging from the roof]
Hang in there baby!
Send the welcome committee!
The Americans can't help but stick their noses in. Soon their world wide war against drugs will be completely compromised!

[after beating up a King Kau thug]
Get lost!
The girl attacked King Kau!
The girl? What are you? Crazy? Whoever attacked King Kau wants to take his business. Get lost.
There's no one driving. I'll get it!
Inspector! Be careful!
Someone's attacking! Go Go! Mr Kau, you better hide!

[approaches with a rail gun]
Teacher. You wanted to be a human. Now you can die like one.

[removes the black mask]
Thank you. I'm honoured. I'd rather die... then live like you.
Have it your way then, teacher! I'm happy to oblige you!

[in the gas chamber]
I'm touched teacher. You seemed choked up by our reunion.

[after a 701 member cut off his own hand to break free of handcuffs]
I had the key!
Wait! Those aren't vessels, it's wiring! Be very careful. Doctor, can we move the heart? It's not clear what's wire and what's vessel.
Get ready, 50 CC's of Adrenaline.
Just how powerful is the bomb?
Based on the amount of liquid nitrogen, I say it could wipe out the room. There are 16 wires intertwined with the veins. We'll have to pair them off and cut them. Inspector, can you give me a hand?
Tell me when to cut.
On my count of three. One... Two... Three!

[looks for a way to escape with Michael after he's injured]
Now where do we go?

[grabs her and tries to yank her off the building]
STRAIGHT DOWN, BITCH!

[to Rock, who's got a bomb strapped to his chest]
I'll say one thing, you've got guts. Which will shortly be apparent, when you explode.
Eat shit!

[after stabbing Michael with a knife]
That's from the Commander. He sent me to murder you...
[holds out her hand to him]
but this time, I can save you, if you'll just come back with me.
There's more to life than just survival. I'd rather die than go back.
We can start over when this is done, just like you said.
I've got news for you Cailyn... it's never done.
Michael, it is done, when we've made them pay.
And just how do you propose doing that? By killing them all?
Once we have the Crimewatch files, they will do whatever we want them to.
I guess I was wrong. We thought we could help each other. Looks like we're both out of luck.
[Michael flees from Cailyn]
[fighting a 701 commando to reach Rock, who has a bomb strapped to him, Michael temporarily gains the upper hand]
Rock, how long?
Stop talking and just kick the motherfucker's ass, would you?
